data.name: PieceEditorHelper1
data.value: This is the piece editor, here you can create new pieces and modify them, the pieces have multiple properties:

data.name: PieceEditorHelper2
data.value: - The Name, for you to recognise the piece.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper4
data.value: When you select only one piece on the left listbox you can see it's layers on the right listbox and you can click the "Change layers" button to customize the piece.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper5
data.value: Here you can see a video with a demo.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper7
data.value: This is the piece editor, here you can change the layers inside a piece.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper8
data.value: The left listbox contains the layers inside the piece, the right listbox contains all the layers you have created.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper10
data.value: - Add: will add the selected layers of the right listbox to the piece.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper11
data.value: - Remove: will remove the selected layers of the left listbox to the piece.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper12
data.value: - Move down: will move down the selected layers of the left listbox.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper13
data.value: - Move up: will move up the selected layers of the left listbox.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper14
data.value: Here you can see a video with a demo.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper14
data.value: Here you can see a video with a demo.

data.name: PieceEditorHelper14
data.value: Here you can see a video with a demo.
